readable.title: 3241726740_6d256d61ec
readable.content: A man smoking a cigarette talking to a lady who is sitting on steps . Lady in black standing and smoking with another girl sitting on the steps . The person in black smoked while the woman in brown sat on the steps . The woman in the black coat is smoking and the woman in the gray coat sits on stone steps . Two women smoking on the steps of a white building .
